import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' const CmpCategory = () => { const [clist,setCategory] = useState([]); const getallCategory =()=>{ fetch('http://localhost/react_project/get_category.php') .then(result =>{ return result.json(); }).then(responds=>{ setCategory(responds) }) } useEffect(()=>{ getallCategory() },[]) return ( <> {JSON.stringify(clist)}
CATEGORY
{clist.map((item, index) =>( ))}
SL NO CATEGORY ACTION
{index+1} {item.cat_name}
) } export default CmpCategory;
